meanings.definition: A small lobe or subdivision of an organ or gland.
meanings.sent1: The liver has a lobule that helps in its functions.
meanings.sent2: The lobule of the lung aids in breathing.
meanings.sent3: The lobule of the kidney decided to take a break from filtering.
meanings.sent4: Her creativity was a lobule branching out into various ideas.
meanings.sent5: The lobule of the brain was like a tiny puzzle piece fitting perfectly.

meanings.definition: A small rounded projection or division.
meanings.sent1: The lobule on the leaf made it look unique.
meanings.sent2: She noticed a lobule on the surface of the mushroom.
meanings.sent3: The lobule on the cupcake added a cute touch to it.
meanings.sent4: The lobule of light through the window brightened the room.
meanings.sent5: The lobule of the rock stood out among the smooth stones.
